text: Lydia Koyonda (born 29 May 1974) is a former football goalkeeper. Koyonda played for the Nigeria women's national football team. In 1991, she played in the FIFA Women's World Cup. She played for the Ufuoma Babes club in Nigeria. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Women's association football goalkeepers
title: Lydia Koyonda
